channel.title: Need a timer for this action (PI) Repp++

item.title: Need a timer for this action (PI) Repp++
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

	case 2717:
		c.lastOpenedCasket = System.currentTimeMillis();
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastOpenedCasket < 20000) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(995, Misc.random(1500000));
			c.sendMessage("You open the casket and receive an award.");
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait two seconds before opening this casket!");
		}
                break;

here is my code

case 2717: c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995,Misc.random(1500000)); c.sendMessage("You open the casket and recieve and award."); break;

How can i make it you have to wait 2 seconds before it works again
